directions: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a small saucepan over medium heat.  Stir in the rice, add the water, and bring to a boil.  Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 16 to 18 minutes, or until water is absorbed and rice is tender.
Meanwhile, melt 1 tablespoon butter in a large skillet over medium heat.  Stir in corn, shallots, sugar, salt and pepper.  Cook, stirring occasionally, for 4 to 6 minutes, or until tender.
In a serving bowl combine cooked rice, corn mixture and mint.
title: Corn and Rice Medley
